title: Ruth Burrows - Catholic spirituality, mysticism (6 books)
description:
Ruth Burrows is an English Carmelite nun and author of numerous books on the spiritual life, many of which explore the teachings of the great Carmelite mystics. This torrent includes six of those books. Five of them are new scans in pdf format; the sixth is in epub and mobi formats and is derived from a retail source.


Titles include:

Interior Castle Explored: St. Teresa's Teaching on the Life of Deep Union With God

Guidelines for Mystical Prayer

Living Love: Meditations on the New Testament; and Our Father: Meditations on the Lord's Prayer (combined volume)

Before the Living God (an autobiography)

To Believe in Jesus (on the basics of the spiritual life, written especially for laypeople)

Essence of Prayer (epub and mobi)
